mapper.select: SELECT r.tbl_wagle_id, u.name, r.content, r.create_date, NVL(l.like_cnt, 0) AS recommend_cnt FROM tbl_user u, tbl_reply r, (SELECT tbl_reply_id, COUNT(*) AS like_cnt FROM tbl_like_reply GROUP BY tbl_reply_id) l WHERE r.tbl_user_id = u.id AND r.id = l.tbl_reply_id(+) AND r.tbl_wagle_id = #{tbl_wagle_id} ORDER BY recommend_cnt DESC OFFSET (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
